name: @minecraft-bedrock-minimap/root
description: Minecraft Bedrock minimap system with TypeScript and Socket.io

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "shared,proxy,minimap,web" -c "green,blue,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:proxy" "npm run dev:minimap" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "shared,proxy,minimap,web,electron" -c "green,blue,magenta,yellow,cyan" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:proxy" "npm run dev:minimap" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:overlay: concurrently -n "shared,proxy,minimap,web,overlay" -c "green,blue,magenta,yellow,red" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:proxy" "npm run dev:minimap" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:electron:overlay"
